name: Help Zat
description:
"Help Zat" is a 2D action / adventure game, inspired by fast games with quick maneuvers, go through a beautiful scenario in order to help the protagonist Zat (a small ball) to reach your home safely, but be careful with the obstacles. With basic commands you will guide him to his destination.

I really want to continue this project, I am very excited. I hope you like it.
I will always be open to suggestions and ideas

Credits:
Opening Song by Pedro H R Leite
Closing song by Pedro H R Leite
Sound effects obtained at https://www.zapsplat.com

Song "You Win" song from https://www.zapsplat.com

Available in English
(soon in Portuguese too)
